additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Betula Alba Bark Extract, Histidine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ecklonia Radiata Extract, Fragrance**, Panthenol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyquaternium-10, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Salicylic Acid, Polyquaternium-7, Glycolic Acid **Fragrance Ingredients include: Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Isobutyl Methyl Tetrahydropyranol, Mixed Terpenes, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene.

description: Herbal Essences Sulphate-Free Birch Bark Shampoo
name: SulphateFree Birch Bark Shampoo
